description:
This module focuses on the financial management of firms with an additional emphasis on an understanding of the financial markets in which the firms and investors operate in. The main objective of this module is to understand the ways in which firms can create value for their shareholders by applying appropriate financial strategies.

Topics covered include time value of money, relationship between risk and return, valuation of bonds and stocks, the bond market and the stock market in Asia and globally
title: Financial management and markets
